MAST.ingredients.errorhandler.vasperror module¶

class MAST.ingredients.errorhandler.vasperror.VaspError(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: MAST.ingredients.errorhandler.baseerror.BaseError

VASP error-handling functions (wraps custodian)

get_error_handlers()[source]¶

Get error handler list from custodian.vasp.handlers. This is a dynamic function because the Materials Project is continuously adding new handlers.

loop_through_errors()[source]¶

Loop through all errors in the error handlers.

set_handler_inputs()[source]¶

We may want to override the files that are being checked, which are usually vasp.out or vasprun.xml. Use key as error handler class name (like ‘VaspErrorHandler’). Use mast_skip to skip the error.
